item.description:
Dear Members,

At this next training rehearsal, we will practice the improvisational games that we'll incorporate into our performance repertoire. The variety of these games will strike a balance between being group oriented and two-person scenes.

A key theme during this rehearsal will be to "listen" to our partner. We can fully respond to the other character only when we fully receive him or her. Pauses and silence will help us achieve this goal.

At the outset, we'll do an intensive warm up to get us back into the flow of things. This warmup will include a couple drills we haven't seen in the past. After two-hours of mind-stretching work, we'll head over to John Harvard's to eat, drink, and talk.

See everyone next week!
Harish

group.name: Great Boston Chapter of Laughing Matter - Auditions Circle

item.name: Open Rehearsal - Training 3
